1) 220 + 330 + 470 = 1020 | 5 = I(1020) -> 0.0049019607843137 | R1 = 1.07843137254902 V | R2 = 1.617647058823521 V | R3 = 2.303921568627439 V
2) 1/Rparallel = 1/220 + 1/330 + 1/470 = 0.00970342 -> 103.0564481389036 | I = 0.0485171 | I4 = 0.0227272727272727 | I5 = 0.0151515151515152 | I6 = 0.0106382978723404
3) Vout = 5 * 220/((330 + 470) + 220) -> 5 * 0.2156862745098039 = 1.07843137254902
Red = 220.26 | Yellow = 200 | Green = 230.47
